AddOnStorageValue.Name: wpForo Forum_Unauthenticated SQL Injection
AddOnStorageValue.Value: { "Id": "284003f8-c885-4080-b8ea-1539767d3bae", "Application": "wpForo Forum", "AffectedVersions": [ "<=1.4.9" ], "VulnerabilityName": "Unauthenticated SQL Injection", "ExternalReferer": "WPVDB-ID-9089, CVE-2018-11515", "Impact": "Critical", "Note": "The wpForo plugin through 2018-02-05 for WordPress has SQL Injection via a search with the /forum/ wpfo parameter." }
